metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4402 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
webservice/lib.php in Moodle 2.1.x before 2.1.8, 2.2.x before 2.2.5, and 2.3.x before 2.3.2 does not properly restrict the use of web-service tokens, which allows remote authenticated users to run arbitrary external-service functions via a token intended for only one service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4402` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.2.6.dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.6.dfsg-1').
